sections.heading: What is Causative Form?
sections.content:
Causative form (使役形) expresses making or letting someone do something.

食べさせる (tabesaseru) - make/let someone eat 書かせる (kakaseru) - make/let someone write させる (saseru) - make/let someone do

children.heading: 1. Make Someone Do (Force)
children.content: 母は子供に野菜を食べさせた "The mother made her child eat vegetables" 先生は学生に本を読ませた "The teacher made the students read books"

children.heading: 2. Let/Allow Someone Do (Permission)
children.content:
親は子供を遊ばせた "The parents let their child play" 先生は学生に質問させた "The teacher let the students ask questions"

Context determines which meaning!

children.heading: Ichidan Verbs
children.content:
Drop る , add させる :

食べる → 食べさせる (make/let eat) 見る → 見させる (make/let see) 寝る → 寝させる (make/let sleep) 起きる → 起きさせる (make/let wake up) 教える → 教えさせる (make/let teach)

children.heading: Godan Verbs
children.content:
Change -u to -aseru :

書く → 書かせる (kaku → kakaseru) kak-u → kak-aseru 読む → 読ませる (yomu → yomaseru) yom-u → yom-aseru 話す → 話させる (hanasu → hanasaseru) hanas-u → hanas-aseru 買う → 買わせる (kau → kawaseru) ka-u → ka-waseru 待つ → 待たせる (matsu → mataseru) mat-u → mat-aseru 遊ぶ → 遊ばせる (asobu → asobaseru) asob-u → asob-aseru 帰る → 帰らせる (kaeru → kaeraseru) kaer-u → kaer-aseru 泳ぐ → 泳がせる (oyogu → oyogaseru) oyog-u → oyog-aseru

children.heading: Irregular Verbs
children.content: する → させる (make/let do) 来る → 来させる (こさせる, kosaseru) (make/let come)

sections.heading: Complete Conjugation Chart
sections.content: | Dictionary | Group | Causative | Meaning | | ---------- | --------- | ---------- | ---------- | | 書く | Godan | 書かせる | make write | | 読む | Godan | 読ませる | make read | | 話す | Godan | 話させる | make speak | | 食べる | Ichidan | 食べさせる | make eat | | 見る | Ichidan | 見させる | make see | | する | Irregular | させる | make do | | 来る | Irregular | 来させる | make come |

children.heading: Pattern 1: を使う (Transitive verbs)
children.content: [Causer]は [Person]に [Object]を [Causative] 母は子供に野菜を食べさせた "Mother made child eat vegetables" 先生は学生に本を読ませた "Teacher made students read book"

children.heading: Pattern 2: に使う (Intransitive verbs)
children.content: [Causer]は [Person]を [Causative] 親は子供を遊ばせた "Parents let child play" 先生は学生を帰らせた "Teacher let students go home"

children.heading: 1. Forcing/Compelling
children.content: 母は私に部屋を掃除させた "My mother made me clean my room" 上司は部下を残業させた "The boss made subordinates work overtime" 先生は学生に宿題をさせた "The teacher made students do homework"

children.heading: 2. Allowing/Permitting
children.content: 親は子供を外で遊ばせた "Parents let their child play outside" 先生は学生に質問させた "Teacher let students ask questions" 医者は患者を帰らせた "Doctor let the patient go home"

children.heading: 3. Causing to Happen
children.content: この映画は私を泣かせた "This movie made me cry" その知らせは皆を驚かせた "That news surprised everyone"

sections.heading: Short Causative (Colloquial)
sections.content:
Godan verbs only: -aseru → -asu

Standard: 行かせる Short: 行かす (ikasu) Standard: 書かせる Short: 書かす (kakasu) Standard: 読ませる Short: 読ます (yomasu)

Ichidan verbs: No short form

食べさせる ✓ 食べさす ✗

sections.heading: Polite Forms
sections.content:
Causative conjugates like Ichidan verbs:

食べさせる → 食べさせます (polite) 書かせる → 書かせます (polite) させる → させます (polite)

children.heading: Negative
children.content: 食べさせない (don't make eat) 書かせない (don't make write) させない (don't make do)

children.heading: Past
children.content: 食べさせた (made eat) 書かせた (made write) させた (made do)

children.heading: Parenting
children.content: 子供に野菜を食べさせる "Make child eat vegetables" 子供を早く寝かせる "Make child sleep early" 子供に勉強させる "Make child study" 子供を遊ばせる "Let child play"

children.heading: Work/School
children.content: 部下に報告書を書かせる "Make subordinate write report" 学生に発表させる "Make students present" 社員を働かせる "Make employees work"

children.heading: Emotions
children.content: 人を笑わせる "Make people laugh" 人を泣かせる "Make people cry" 人を待たせる "Make people wait" 人を怒らせる "Make people angry"

sections.heading: Requesting Permission (させてください)
sections.content:
やらせてください "Please let me do it" 行かせてください "Please let me go" 見させてください "Please let me see" 話させてください "Please let me speak"

This is polite request for permission!

children.heading: Mistake 1: Wrong Particles
children.content:
Wrong: 子供が野菜を食べさせる ❌ Right: 母は子供に野菜を食べさせる ✓ Wrong: 学生は本を読ませる ❌ Right: 先生は学生に本を読ませる ✓

The causer is the subject (は)!

children.heading: Mistake 2: Confusing を and に
children.content: Transitive: 子供に野菜を食べさせる ✓ (Child is marked by に, vegetables by を) Intransitive: 子供を遊ばせる ✓ (Child is marked by を, no object)

children.heading: Mistake 3: Using Short Form with Ichidan
children.content: Wrong: 食べさす ❌ Right: 食べさせる ✓ Short form only for Godan!

children.heading: Mistake 4: Wrong Conjugation
children.content: Wrong: 書く → 書くさせる ❌ Right: 書く → 書かせる ✓ Wrong: 食べる → 食べるさせる ❌ Right: 食べる → 食べさせる ✓

sections.heading: Causative with Te-form
sections.content: 子供に野菜を食べさせて、褒めた "I made my child eat vegetables and praised them" 学生に発表させて、評価した "I made students present and evaluated them"

children.heading: させてもらう (receive permission)
children.content: やらせてもらう "receive permission to do / be allowed to do" 行かせてもらった "I was allowed to go" 見させてもらいました "I was allowed to see"

children.heading: させてくれる (someone allows)
children.content: 親が行かせてくれた "My parents let me go" 先生が質問させてくれた "The teacher let me ask questions"

children.heading: Example 1: Parenting
children.content: A: 子供に何を食べさせますか？ "What do you make your child eat?" B: 野菜をたくさん食べさせます "I make them eat lots of vegetables" A: 大変ですね "That must be tough" B: はい、なかなか食べてくれません "Yes, they don't really eat it"

children.heading: Example 2: Work
children.content: A: 部下に何をさせましたか？ "What did you make your subordinate do?" B: レポートを書かせました "I made them write a report" A: 終わりましたか？ "Did they finish?" B: まだです。明日までに終わらせます "Not yet. I'll have them finish by tomorrow"

children.heading: Example 3: Permission
children.content: A: 先生、質問させてください "Teacher, please let me ask a question" B: はい、どうぞ "Yes, go ahead" A: この問題が分かりません "I don't understand this problem" B: 説明しましょう "I'll explain"

children.heading: Making Someone Wait
children.content: 待たせてすみません "Sorry for making you wait" あまり待たせないでください "Please don't make me wait too long" 彼を待たせた "I made him wait"

children.heading: Emotional Impact
children.content: その映画は私を泣かせた "That movie made me cry" 彼の話は皆を笑わせた "His story made everyone laugh" その知らせは親を心配させた "That news made my parents worry"

children.heading: Commands/Requests
children.content: やらせろ！ "Let me do it!" (rough) 行かせてくれ "Let me go" 見させてください "Please let me see" (polite)

sections.heading: Key Takeaways
sections.content:
✓ Causative = make/let someone do ✓ Godan: -u → -aseru ✓ Ichidan: -ru → -saseru ✓ Two meanings: force or allow ✓ Causer uses は, person uses に/を ✓ Short form: -asu (Godan only) ✓ させてください = polite permission request ✓ Context determines meaning

Master causative form - essential for expressing control!
